body_html: For the pretraining I see the best possible solution is to write modular code where I plug my Generator and Discriminator either in GANEstimator together or each one in a single Estimator for pretraining. This was my initial approach but that fails due to different shape checks and slightly different behavior (as reported above) of GANEstimator compared to Estimator. That is also why I suggest to make them more alike.

body: For the pretraining I see the best possible solution is to write modular code where I plug my `Generator` and `Discriminator` either in `GANEstimator` together or each one in a single `Estimator` for pretraining. This was my initial approach but that fails due to different shape checks and slightly different behavior (as reported above) of `GANEstimator` compared to `Estimator`. That is also why I suggest to make them more alike.
